body:
Update our signapple and python-certvalidator dependencies to the latest available versions.

Guix Build (macOS):
```bash
find guix-build-$(git rev-parse --short=12 HEAD)/output/ -type f -print0 | env LC_ALL=C sort -z | xargs -r0 sha256sum
9aa20fd1606ab00d94370689bc9e2d46d1929ecaac7d03f3f6d372ed7fe3cf13  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/arm64-apple-darwin/SHA256SUMS.part
8a572bda06e1ad2e53bd5cf046f60976306f7df87e47861bdec531a8f5191ca5  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/arm64-apple-darwin/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7-arm64-apple-darwin.tar.gz
c8f57252f8d72a070cf3facf08f5864fd71c38327e8dfb7e302f3ff2d5be8016  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/arm64-apple-darwin/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7-osx-unsigned.dmg
9b7c8920dc6ec9c9d023c15205a6a9c56fa8e26721ff4aadeabe23ccf9c6d5de  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/arm64-apple-darwin/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7-osx-unsigned.tar.gz
450a3b84e54cdc19b28f1bb15c6f11029d552377be4de455d811be14c9206424  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/dist-archive/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7.tar.gz
8a4b0420502140673c2e044f4fd54f33c6471708c211de672d9455b2b0071a1d  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/x86_64-apple-darwin/SHA256SUMS.part
e9c3c4554bef21404f85f82f52d20469a10f1bd97bd2fb457d81b052daaf55e7  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/x86_64-apple-darwin/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7-osx-unsigned.dmg
1ad5fb4e965b926347ce9476ce4b883b20f1d6c9042a97ddf8c38542a7ea4f9b  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/x86_64-apple-darwin/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7-osx-unsigned.tar.gz
c915fd3b1df3014ca8d3b0e3547a19a0257d37c48f79165891b4455e7a4a9314  guix-build-6c5aa413cfa7/output/x86_64-apple-darwin/bitcoin-6c5aa413cfa7-osx64.tar.gz
```
title: guix: use the latest version of signapple
